comment._content: Middle initial should be "F." not "A." This is a photo of John F. Hurley, Mayor of Salem, Massachusetts. He was mayor during "The Great Salem Fire of 1914" which occurred June 25th of that year. While relatively few lives were reportedly lost, the fire destroyed over 1,300 buildings, leaving approximately 20,000 people homeless and 10,000 jobless. See: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Great_Salem_Fire_of_1914 A panoramic photo of the resulting devastation (Photo credit: Wikipedia Commons):
